SELECT CLUB.CLUB_CODE , CLUB_NAME , CLUB.CLUB_TIER , CLUB_LEADER , MEMBER_NAME , CLUB_PERSONNEL , CLUB_HEAD_COUNT , TIER.TIER_NAME , CLUB_INTRO FROM TENNIS_CLUB CLUB, TENNIS_MEMBER MEM, TENNIS_TIER TIER WHERE CLUB.CLUB_LEADER = MEM.MEMBER_ID AND CLUB.CLUB_TIER = TIER.TIER_CODE
AND CLUB.CLUB_CODE = #{clubCode}
SELECT MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NAME , TIER_NAME FROM TENNIS_MEMBER MEM, TENNIS_TIER TIER WHERE MEM.TIER_CODE = TIER.TIER_CODE AND CLUB_CODE = #{clubCode}
SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_ID) FROM TENNIS_MEMBER WHERE CLUB_CODE IS NULL AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
